nodes.text: Dreanna Conunda was a human female pilot. She served as a flight instructor at the New Republic academy on Chandrila, and also worked as a test pilot for the Corellian Engineering Corporation. By the time of the war between the First Order and the Resistance, Conunda had joined the Resistance, and acted as the pilot of the transport Fortitude.
Dreanna Conunda is played by Andreea Diac in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. In the movie credits, the character is merely listed as "Lander Pilot".
